about_the_game:
Unleash the Power of Precision!


Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of military engineering with the Model Builder: Military Pack DLC! This FREE expansion introduces three iconic scale models, allowing you to immerse yourself in the meticulous craft of assembling and painting legendary military vehicles.

F14 Fighter Plane:
Dominate the skies with the F14 Tomcat, an engineering marvel renowned for its speed and agility. Featuring retractable wings and intricate details, this iconic fighter plane is a must-have for aviation enthusiasts. Can you assemble it with precision and bring this beast to life?

A10 Thunderbolt Plane:
Get ready to deliver ground-shaking firepower! The A10 Thunderbolt II, affectionately known as the "Warthog," is a fearsome close air support aircraft. With its distinctive shape and powerful arsenal, assembling this model is a challenge that rewards you with an awe-inspiring representation of military might.

Sherman Tank:
Roll into history with the legendary Sherman Tank. A symbol of resilience and firepower during World War II, this model offers intricate details of the iconic tank, from its tracks to the turret. Assemble and paint your way through history, commemorating the heroic stories of the soldiers who operated these formidable war machines.

GET THEM ALL!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

name: Model Builder: Military Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of military engineering with the Model Builder: Military Pack DLC! This FREE expansion introduces three iconic scale models, F14 Fighter Plane, A10 Thunderbolt Plane and the Sherman Tank.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
